net.metro.systemobjects

Class Period

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.metro.systemobjects.Period
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Period>

    public final class Period
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Period>
    Object that defines a time period within which a Service operates.
    Author:
    Sean Harger

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Period pd)
        Compares two Period objects according to their Days and TimePeriods.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Period>
        Parameters:
        pd - Period to compare with this one
        Returns:
        0 if the two Periods are equal
        positive integer if the passed period is contained within this period
        negative integer if the passed period lies outside of this period
